title: "National Information Processing Institute to create neural language models in Polish"
excerpt: "The National Information Processing Institute develops neural language models used to detect spam and antiplagiarism systems. Two new models have been launched this year: Polish RoBERTa v2 and GPT-2 intended for tasks related to the text generation."
